#summary Notes about the ICAT meeting in Dublin in Ireland in March 2014
#labels Featured

= Meeting in Ireland in 2014 =

== Date and time ==

13:30 on 24/Mar/2014 to 12:30 on 25/Mar/2014.

with dinner on the evening of the 24th. 

== Location ==

The meeting will be held in the Large Conference Room (LCR),School of Computer Science and Statistics, O'Reilly Institute, Trinity College Dublin - see http://www.tcd.ie/Maps/map.php?q=O%20Reilly%20Institute.

Please note that the visitor entrance for the O'Reilly Institute is through the adjacent external stairwell of the Hamilton Building, see - http://www.tcd.ie/Maps/map.php?b=195. Reduced mobility access is also available through the ground floor of the Hamilton Institute. Wireless networking will be available at the venue.

== Agenda ==

The  [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AsEvjQRbSmledEFyV2tFeFRWclY0aXVMWjc1RVdVRHc&usp=sharing provisional agenda] may be consulted.

== Attending ==

If you plan to attend this meeting please note you intention at [http://doodle.com/7x2shyzh5aayqidv doodle poll]

<wiki:comment>

= Agenda =

The purpose is to discuss plans for the development and use of ICAT at facilities and by projects such as Pandata and Crisp.

All times are too specific to be realistic.  The names are indicative.  The agenda is likely to change.
